name: Eddie Ng
body:
I am an embedded systems software engineer experienced in C with a background in Computer Engineering and have been working since I graduated in 2010. I'm interested in pursuing a career in web development. I spend my spare time reading about or tinkering with JavaScript and Python, exercising, eating more than I should, and dreaming of living in NYC.

Languages I've worked with: 
---
* C/C++, JavaScript, Python, Java

Technology I'm learning about:
---
* Web development (MVC Architecture)
* AngularJS
* Asynchronous Programming

# Favorite Projects

***
### [WafelLocator](http://linked82000.github.io/WafelLocator/)
WafelLocator is an app designed to make it easy to locate all the Wafels & Dinges locations in New York and most importantly, to get the directions to the closest one!   
 
[https://github.com/linked82000/WafelLocator](https://github.com/linked82000/WafelLocator)

***
### [Geocode](http://linked82000.github.io/Geocode/)
Geocode is an app to plot an entered location on an overhead map as well as display a StreetView panorama. Think a watered-down, customized Google Maps. It's an amalgamation of Google Maps APIs, jQuery, and other things I wanted to play with!

[https://github.com/linked82000/Geocode](https://github.com/linked82000/Geocode)

***
### [Ablockalypse](http://www.eecs.tufts.edu/~eng04/COMP50GD/)
In a past life, I made a game for the Android using the Android SDK (Java)!

***
### [GameOfLife](http://linked82000.github.io/GameOfLifeJS/)
A simple port of Conway's Game of Life. 

[https://github.com/linked82000/GameOfLifeJS](https://github.com/linked82000/GameOfLifeJS)

***
### [TicTacToe](http://linked82000.github.io/TicTacToeJS/)
Super silly TicTacToe. Reminiscent of the earliest web sites circa the 1990s!

[https://github.com/linked82000/TicTacToeJS](https://github.com/linked82000/TicTacToeJS)

Email: wards.ng@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
